attributes.action: To stop the ban of 4D and 3D number plates in September 2021
attributes.additional_details: As of September 2021 4D and 3D will no long be allowed to be used on the uk roads. This is unfair as hundreds of thousands of road users have purchased these plates to use on the road legal and would like to continue to use them.
attributes.background: We would like to continue the use of 4D and 3D number plates on the Uk roads

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569318
